entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • End of year 2024 repo health check #110456
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_GetCounters Failed #110454
  • System.Text.Json.JsonException thrown when deserializing asynchronously to nullable types #110450
  • ParameterInfo.ToString() is inconsistent with the .NET Framework behavior #110447
  • Uppercase #110446
  • Wasm test failure on HttpRequest_BodylessMethod_LargeContentLength #110445
  • Incorrect nullability declaration with return value of LocalCertificateSelectionCallback delegate #110444
  • .NET 9: Zeroconf discovery is broken #110443
  • ASPNet service crashing on linux-arm64 when targeted to net9.0 #110442
    10.0.0
  • Error: System.ArgumentException: Identifier is not CLS-compliant. (Parameter 'ident') #110435
  • [API Proposal]: Provide means to construct a CoseSign1Message with private key in Azure Key Vault #110431
  • [API Proposal]: Consider Equals method(s) on DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler to avoid temporary string allocations #110427

Closed

  • [mono] Test failed on windows: System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.Tests.SortRequestControlTests #34679
    Future
  • dotnet: /lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.34' not found (required by dotnet) (Installing on Raspberry pi 3) #109993
  • `ObjectFactory<T>` delegate should be covariant #101829
    10.0.0
  • Inlining perf regression .net8 to .net9 #110453
  • Cannot step into a Tail Call #110441
    8.0.x
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder, types throw exceptions even after created #108733
    10.0.0
  • JsonSerializer uses different default values for properties between reading and writing, causing data loss in round-trips #110423
  • System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement - Invalid URI after upgrade to 9.0 #110400
  • LdapConnection throws `LdapException: The feature is not supported` when using Negotiate or Kerberos authentication #109449
    10.0.0
  • Specific double to decimal conversion has unexpected result #110439
  • Loading assemblies from root folder `/` fails on linux arm64 (error code 0x80070002) #109593
  • System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientTest.TestZeroTimeout hangs in CI #31719
    Future
  • failed to build when make #110429
  • How to use a custom source generator to inform the source generator of System.Text.Json to generate code for the corresponding class #110428
    Future
  • LINQ All returns True if the size of the collection is 0. #110433
  • AF Thread::IsObjRefValid(&objref) in RuntimeMethodHandle_InvokeMethod #110394
  • Cross build on windows 11 arm64 #110424
  • Nullable JsonDocument property will deserialized to JsonValueKind.Null instead of null #110231

PullRequests

Created

  • Update area-owners with up-to-date information about community triagers. #110460
    area-Meta
  • Fix `IDE0251: Make member readonly` #110459
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Remove DiagnosticSource reference from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions #110458
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Logging
  • fix wrong arguments order in CrlCacheExpired call #110457
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Allow stack size to be configured for native AOT #110455
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove `fgFirstColdBlock` checks in frontend phases #110452
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't run `fgComputeBlockWeights` in MinOpts #110451
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Handle no method def token when trying to get the IL version state #110449
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Re-enable bundle archive building in source build #110448
    blocked, blocking, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110440
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110438
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Remove some RuntimeExport/RuntimeImport indirections #110437
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix for "ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: _Uaarch64_setcontext" when doing build for FreeBSD-arm64 using internal libunwind #110432
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update helix images #110384
    area-Infrastructure
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Make `ObjectFactory<T>` covariant #102553
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Install zlib in the IlcFrameworkNative folder instead of alongside the runtime #110378
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110334
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder missing methods on generated types #109320
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: Force using LDAP V3 for SASL binding #109450
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Handle not truncating root folder in `CorUnix::InternalCanonicalizeRealPath` for all architectures instead of only amd64 #110425
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: Always aggressively compact blocks #109521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110377
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix zlib-ng build with cmake 3.31.0 #110359
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Only build cdac-build-tool when we need to build runtime #109719
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix conversion of `void*` to `OBJECTREF` #110426
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Handle type descs in `RuntimeTypeSystem_1.GetLoaderModule` #110325
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 10.0.0
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan (Try 2) #109707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI test: Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    NO-REVIEW, area-HostModel
  • [8.0] Guard against empty Accept address #108334
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    arch-arm32, arch-x86, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't do opportunistic ISA lightup if there are plans to run the AltJit code #110419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix UNC paths #110033
    area-Host
  • Propose new async API #110420
    area-Meta
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Lazily-initialize RegexCompiler's cached reflection members #109283
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Avoid generic virtual dispatch for frozen collections alternate lookup #108732
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Enable AltJits build for LoongArch64 and RiscV64 #110282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Update System.Speech to also recognize Speech_OneCore #110123
    area-System.Speech
  • Tweak `EncodeToUtf16_Vector128` #110203
    community-contribution, needs-author-action, needs-area-label
  • Change assertion in IPGlobalProperties_DomainName_ReturnsEmptyStringWhenNotSet #110070
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #110393
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix return address hijacking with CET #109548
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #110163
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Projection tooling] Implement Swift type registrar #2842
  • [Projection tooling] Implement ABI/MachO parser #2845
  • [Projection tooling] Implement demangler #2844
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift protocols in C# #2824

PullRequests

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Added pinvokes for handling ARC #2860
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add the `WasmComponentTypeWit` item group #2859
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Interp doc for implementation of calls #2858
  • Add documents on the Mono interpreter analysis #2857
    area-CoreclrInterpreter

Merged

  • [SwiftBindings] Describe protocol constraints #2811
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [RuntimeAsync] Fix a couple of cases where x86 would overwrite ecx on return #2854
    area-async

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Switch the implementation to the new shape of runtime async methods. #2818
    area-async

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generate an error or warning when building under the downloads folder #45342
  • Create documentation on how to safely run repro projects #45341
  • Create documentation about trust boundaries of the .NET SDK and how to use it securely #45340
  • dotnet publish regularly fails with OutOfMemory after update to .NET 9 #45336
  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314

Closed

  • Update sdk to use new Arcade .deb creation tooling #43688

PullRequests

Created

  • Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Restore detailed test logging to console output #45344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Restore detailed test logging to console output #45343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove global usings from projects building source packages #45339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use dotnet exec to run test app in CheckTargetFrameworkDisplayName #45332
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix BuildPass>1 artifacts and asset manifest content #45323
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add mstest dependency #45322
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/9.0.2xx] [dotnet-format] Include the .NET Framework buildhost executable in the SDK. #45321
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use legacy WASM APIs when newer ones are not available #45317
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Use arcade infra for DEB and RPM build #45047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.101 December 2024 Updates #45289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [backport][dotnet-format] Include the .NET Framework buildhost executable in the SDK. #45291
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix warning level calculation for .NET 10 #45295
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable the build look-up during VMR sync #45325
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use temp directory as TestExecutionDirectory in RunTestsOnHelix.sh #45022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #45315
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Review for breaking changes, breaking-change, Area-CLI, Area-VS, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Enable Signing in Repos that Override Build Actions #44855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't publish PrivateAssets Fixes #39400 #45259
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Don't download Windows SDK ref pack for C++ projects #44956
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink, consider-for-documentation
  • Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #45263
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add integration tests for dotnet test scenarios #45138
    Area-DotNet Test
  • fix(cli): dotnet help new link opening #45282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unnecessary defensive copy on `readonly struct` when performing a constrained call #76288
  • MSBuild Workspace fails to build MAUI library #76287
  • EnC: Hot Reload fails with unhelpful error message (CS7038) when there are multiple references to the same DLL (System.Runtime) #76284
  • Generated source code does not refresh #76283
  • IDE0058 Not Generated for Expression Bodied Methods #76282
  • Generate ConsList-like type on `[first, .. rest]` expressions on IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #76280
  • Potential missed case with `CS1918` #76278
  • Crash in the compiler when trying random things out with the "Implicit index access" feature syntax #76277
  • Area - Remove Unnecessary Parentheses #76274

Closed

  • [LSP] Properly respect client capabilities before responding to LSP requests #50763
    Backlog
  • LSP and VS difference in GoToDefinition #53755
    Backlog
  • Fix `Implement abstract class` generates invalid code when target type has no body and is followed by file-scoped type #75992
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Re-enable LSP GoToDefinition + GoToImplementation integration tests #61188
    Backlog
  • Re-enable support in LSP code actions for creating files. #65303
    Backlog
  • [.NET 10] certain `[Obsolete]` warnings are not reported #76226
    17.13
  • "Editor Color Scheme" option is not available when using the "Use system setting" color theme #72735
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix broken strings in Unified Setting page #76289
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove OfferRemoveUnusedReferencesFlag #76286
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Add support for getting debugger data tips through LSP. #76285
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Cache the MEF composition in the Roslyn LSP. #76276
    Area-IDE, LSP, VSCode
  • Fix directive placement when removing nodes using syntax API. #76275
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update SystemTextJsonVersion #76273
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix multiple updates for dynamic file #76281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Improve parsing recovery with 'file' keyword #76185
    Area-Compilers, Feature - File-Local Types, VSCode, Next
  • Update NuGet-packages.md #76279
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move off of specialized task methods #76149
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update runtime async format to use methodimpl #76105
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async, Next
  • Use named pipes to connect to the BuildHost process. #76259
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add "string literals in data section" feature status #76258
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8, Next
  • Update Razor DynamicFile Provider #76050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Codeql suppression in SemanticSearchToolWindowImpl #76271
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Check ref safety of arg mixing in collection initializers #76237
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ref Fields
  • Check ref safety of arg mixing in interpolated strings #76263
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider silly cyclic assignment in scoped variance #76261
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit opted-in string literals into data section as UTF8 #76036
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Emit multiple deltas for a project with multiple baselines #76272
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UI Not Updating After Task.Delay in .NET MAUI Blazor Component #59347
  • Provide an extra private readonly property on the SignalR HubConnectionContext #59346
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json #59345
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, json #59344
  • model binding for nullable parameter creates empty collection instead of null #59343
  • Access is denied - VS 17.12.3 #59342
  • JIT optimization breaks simple method on Azure App Service in .net 9 #59341
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server : After build, OpenAPI specification file isn't present in the build result #59334
  • Context(?) for razor and codebehind files break at random occasions #59330
  • Weak Encryption in ManagedPbkdf2Provider class #59329
  • The JSON value could not be converted to InternalAccessTokenResult #59328
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #59327
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-noop, json #59326
  • ASP.NET Core 9.0: Swagger UI when returning async TypedResults shows Void under the schema #59324
  • Properties are not visible in open api spec when using BindAsync #59323

Closed

  • [Blazor WebAssembly] `dotnet watch` may not inject `aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js` after `dotnet run` #59276
    10.0-preview1
  • Unable to accurately determine SignalR message size and prevent InvalidDataException. Based on my testing, this is Blazor Server specific #59335
  • Perf improvement: json #59255
  • Blazor 9's AddAuthenticationStateSerialization() and AddAuthenticationStateDeserialization() appear to lack support for external API JWT authentication scenarios #59318
  • Cannot use Client Certificate Authentication in .http files #59285
  • Loading JavaScript files associated with Blazor components without giving full path. #59320
  • How to Fix ASP0006 within a loop? #59292
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, updates #59280
  • SignalR WebSocket Connection Fails Due to Excessive URL Length When Using Large JWT Access Tokens in Blazor WebAssembly #58534

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor WASM standalone] Avoid caching `index.html` during development #59349
    area-blazor, ask-mode, feature-blazor-wasm, feature-hot-reload, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] [Blazor WASM standalone] Avoid caching `index.html` during development #59348
    area-blazor, ask-mode, feature-blazor-wasm, feature-hot-reload, 9.0.x
  • [Infrastructure] Updated npm packages 2024-12-05 #59339
    area-infrastructure
  • [Infrastructure] Script to automatically update Selenium and Playwright dependencies #59338
    area-infrastructure
  • Update RequestLocalizationMiddleware.cs #59333
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Added simplified null checking. #59331
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/9.0] Return 206 Partial Content on Valid Range for Static Assets #59325
    area-blazor, 9.0.x

Merged

  • [Blazor WebAssembly standalone] Don't cache `index.html` during development #59340
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, feature-hot-reload, 10.0-preview1
  • [Infrastructure] Update Selenium versions #59268
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • perf: get rid of MemoryStream in `KeyRingBasedDataProtector` #59322
    area-dataprotection, Perf
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    area-infrastructure
  • Use `NullLogger` instead of `NullLoggerFactory.CreateLogger` #59281
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Add IsEmptyOrAtEnd method to StringSegment #59242
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Replace ANY ip to root as url when generating OpenAPI's servers prope… #59314
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, feature-openapi
  • Add WebAssemblyHotReloadCapabilities msbuild property #59094
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • Update README.md #59191
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Change OpenAPI document name resolution to be case-insensitive #59199
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Prevent ArgumentOutOfRangeException when handling nested generic types #59201
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-openapi, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make ProcessInfo / DiagnosticClient.GetProcessInfo public #5087
  • Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client versioning prevents adopting preview for validation #5085

Closed

  • Need explanation for Memory Type in the SOS maddress output #5079
    10.0.0
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `diagnostics/release/stable` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #5076

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove prerelease label from Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client #5088
  • Make DiagnosticsClient.ApplyStartupHook public #5086

Merged

  • Update release/stable branch #5084
  • Fix release platform count in setup layout leg #5083
  • Update release/stable from main #5082

Updated

  • Add DiagnosticsClientConnector to support creating a DiagnosticsClient from a diagnostic port #5073

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Infinite loop on Windows for new TimePicker event, TimeSelected #26415
  • Get C# Stack trace of MAUI iOS without using any CrashAnalytics #26414
  • Windows on ARM: Template is not functional #26408
  • Blazor MAUI with Strapi <a> iOS 18 issue #26405
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid and Web app without Identity #26407
    Backlog
  • [IOS, Mac]Inconsistent Resize Behavior for Header/Footer #26397
    Backlog
  • Setting `Window.TitleBar` to `null` does not remove the customization #26396
    Backlog
  • [IOS]Footer not displaying in iOS when StackOrientation.Horizontal is set on FlyoutFooter #26395
    Backlog
  • [Android] Click on flyout clicks on page behind #26392
    Backlog
  • [WINDOWS]Dynamically Added FlyoutItems During Navigation Not Displayed on Windows #26391
    Backlog
  • The LeadingContent of the TitleBar appears before the App Info section. #26378
    Backlog
  • [Windows] ListView incorrect grouped collection range removal #26377

Closed

  • Build failed in Release with exit code 139 #26369
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Connectivity NETWORK_CAPABILITIES_CHANGED causing SIGSEGV Segfault? #25446
  • Use of Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Xaml.StaticExtension generates warnings #26372
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Build errors in Visual Studio 2022 when building a Maui app using Microsoft.Maui.Controls v9.0.12 and same version of Compatibility #26398
  • [Windows] Setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #18937
    Backlog
  • Maui CarousselView is still no sizing correct in iOS #26389
  • Net 9 Android - StatusBar Color overriden on modal pages #26388
  • System.InvalidCastException when using a custom map handler on iOS and .NET 9. #26000
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps crash when IsShowingUser = true in Release mode (iOS, NET 9 rc2) #25762
    Backlog
  • Collection view with horizontal grid layout has extra space on right (end) of collection #25433
    Backlog
  • No background color on Flyout navigation bar #25737
  • Unable to build and run an Android .NET 7 application with the latest MAUI .NET 9 / Visual Studio 17.12 installed #25845
  • Entry ReturnType="Next" doesn't work with SfTextInputLayout #26383
  • Specify Front or Back Camera - MediaPicker CapturePhotoAsync() #26371
  • Unable to make UICalendarSelectionSingleDateDelegate working on iOS 17.5 in my handler #24074

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows][ Add correct menu bar item foreground resource override #26413
  • Set up MauiGResources for Localization #26412

  • Change the yaml to build PR if lcl files were changed #26411
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR3
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10663811 #26410
  • Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.2 to 1.0.3 #26406
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 35 #26404
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 34 #26403
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 33 #26402
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed MenuBarItem Foreground not updated #26401
    community ✨
  • [XC] Of course valuetype can implement interfaces #26400
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed CheckBox enabled color is not updated properly #26399
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for ListView ScrollTo Method throws NullReferenceException #26385
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 32 #26380
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Owned .ToJson() columns cannot .Ignore() complex properties requiring all properties be mapped as Owned types #35280
  • Allow parameterized types in queries using inheritance mapping (TPH, possibly even TPC/TPT) #35278
  • EF Core SQL Translation Uses Bitwise Operations Instead of CASE Statement for Boolean Comparisons #35277
  • Debug view threw Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.RuntimeNavigation' to type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.AnnotatableBase' #35276
  • EF Core 9.0 SQLite with Net Topology Suite on Docker/Linux silent crash #35275
  • Queries on primitive collections cannot be translated when using a compiled model #35273

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Handle first class spans #35279

Merged

  • Update instruction for daily builds to 10. #35274

Updated

  • Change ExecuteUpdate to accept non-expression lambda #35257
  • Adding support for multiple and named query filters #35104
    needs-design

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-05
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #20263
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #20260

Updated

  • Add a direct STJ reference to lift the verison used by the releases library #20262
    Branch Lockdown
